author: Buddha
content: With zeal do today what must be done. Who knows? Tomorrow comes death.

author: ChatGPT
content: Your tasks (probably) won't do themselves.

author: ChatGPT
content: Checking the app? Your goals are rolling their eyes.

author: ChatGPT
content: If not now, when? Certainly not tomorrow ;)

author: ChatGPT
content: Instead of checking here, why not do something productive?

author: ChatGPT
content: Want to take a break? I wonder what your deadlines think about that. ;)

author: ChatGPT
content: Distraction is for the weak.

author: ChatGPT
content: Working with focus: the best way to escape boredom.

author: ChatGPT
content: Want to be like a GPS? Find your goal and go straight.

author: ChatGPT
content: Don't be like WiFi in a caf√© - distracted and slow.

author: ChatGPT
content: Curious if your tasks will do themselves.

author: ChatGPT
content: Focus. Your dreams are packaged, just waiting for delivery.

author: ChatGPT
content: Focused work is for those who want to achieve something. Strange, isn't it?

author: ChatGPT
content: Check your phone, you might miss something. But success doesn't wait.

author: ChatGPT
content: Not in the mood for deep work today? Your goals can wait too.

author: ChatGPT
content: Focus now, Instagram can wait. Maybe.

author: ChatGPT
content: If focus is the key, distraction is the lock. Will you open it?

author: ChatGPT
content: Deep work is a luxury everyone should afford.

author: Robert Collier
content: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.

author: Seneca
content: It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste a lot of it.

author: ChatGPT
content: Focus now, success later. Act.

author: ChatGPT
content: Shallow work is an illusion of productivity.

author: ChatGPT
content: Each hour of focus is a step closer to mastery.

author: ChatGPT
content: A daily dose of focus brings long-term benefits.

author: ChatGPT
content: Focus is the most valuable currency of the 21st century.

author: ChatGPT
content: Working deeply makes the impossible possible.

author: ChatGPT
content: Your dreams deserve full focus.

author: ChatGPT
content: If success is the goal, focus is the way.

author: ChatGPT
content: Deep work is the foundation for your success.

author: ChatGPT
content: Shallow work is cheap, deep work is priceless.

author: ChatGPT
content: Deep work is the bridge between dreams and reality.
